name: Cybercade
description:
Overview:
Inspired by the classic shoot at the screen arcade games like Area 51 and Time Crisis. Play alone, with friends, or with strangers.

Blast your way through heart pounding shootouts. The environment pulses with beat of the music.  Dodge bullets and shoot missiles out of mid air. 

Play in "Casual"  mode for a stress free experience, or play in "Arcade" mode with limited lives for big high scores!
